Title: The Things of Life
Writer: Sandro Continenza (dialogue: Italian version), Jean-Loup Dabadie (adaptation), Paul Guimard (novel), Paul Guimard (screenplay), Claude Sautet (adaptation)
Actors: Michel Piccoli, Romy Schneider, Gérard Lartigau, Jean Bouise
Plot: Pierre, a successful engineer in building highways has a traffic accident. Being seriously wounded, he is lying waiting for death and remembering his past in flashbacks.
